Module ZiqiYang
Package org.ziqi.gameEngine.base

Class GameScreen

java.lang.Object
org.ziqi.gameEngine.base.GameScreen
Direct Known Subclasses:
GamingScreen, LevelSetScreen, PopUpScreen, ScoreBoardScreen, StartScreen, VictoryScreen
public abstract class GameScreen
extends java.lang.Object
GameScreen class as super class(parent) of all other show-able GameScreens in the game.
This class contains some reusable methods to render the screen and a root pane javafx layout.
The display of this object will be implemented as an adapter design pattern by ScreenPlayer.
Author:
Ziqi Yang
See Also:
ScreenPlayer, GamingScreen, LevelSetScreen, ScoreBoardScreen, StartScreen, VictoryScreen, PopUpScreen

  • Method Details

    • getM_Root

      public javafx.scene.layout.Pane getM_Root()
      Gets the root layout of the GameScreen.
      Returns:
      A pane layout as a root of the scene of the GameScreen to be shown is returned.

    • getInitializable

      public javafx.fxml.Initializable getInitializable​(java.lang.String viewName)
      Initializes the GameScreen read from a 'fxml' file and gets the controller of this 'fxml' file.
      This method is called when the GameScreen uses the help of 'fxml' file.
      The layout of 'fxml' will be added onto the root layout.
      Parameters:
      viewName - String value specifying the name of 'fxml' file to read.
      Returns:
      The controller class of read 'fxml' file is returned to make further operation of the GameScreen.
      See Also:
      GamingScreenController, LevelSetScreenController, ScoreBoardScreenController, StartScreenController, VictoryScreenController

    • makeFadeTransition

      public static void makeFadeTransition​(javafx.animation.FadeTransition ft, javafx.scene.Node node, int millis, double fromValue, double toValue)
      Defines a given FadeTransition by given parameters and sets it on the given node infinitely.
      Parameters:
      ft - New fadeTransition to be set by given parameter.
      node - The node which the FadeTransition will be add on.
      millis - Integer value specifying the millisecond duration of the FadeTransition.
      fromValue - The double value specifying the starting opacity of the transition.
      toValue - The double value specifying the ending opacity of the transition.
      See Also:
      FadeTransition

    • makeTranslateTransition

      public static void makeTranslateTransition​(javafx.animation.TranslateTransition tt, javafx.scene.Node node, int millis, double offsetX, double offsetY)
      Defines a given TranslateTransition by given parameters and sets it on the given node infinitely.
      Parameters:
      tt - New TranslateTransition to be set by given parameter.
      node - The node which the TranslateTransition will be add on.
      millis - Integer value specifying the millisecond duration of the TranslateTransition.
      offsetX - Double value specifying the horizontal offset translation.
      offsetY - Double value specifying the vertical offset translation.
      See Also:
      TranslateTransition

    • makeTranslateTransition

      public static void makeTranslateTransition​(javafx.animation.TranslateTransition tt, javafx.scene.Node node, int millis, double offsetX, double offsetY, int cycleCount)
      Defines a given TranslateTransition by given parameters and sets it on the given node for a given cycles.
      Parameters:
      tt - New TranslateTransition to be set by given parameter.
      node - The node which the TranslateTransition will be add on.
      millis - Integer value specifying the millisecond duration of the TranslateTransition.
      offsetX - Double value specifying the horizontal offset translation.
      offsetY - Double value specifying the vertical offset translation.
      cycleCount - Integer value specifying the count of cycles the translation will loop.
      See Also:
      TranslateTransition, ;
